description: Kyouta`s emotional crisis jeopardizes the scheduling for T.L.System`s debut concert; Jun and Shingo are at their wit`s end. At her photo shooting Kiriko shows her full potential only when Sadamura allows her to listen to Kyouta`s song, much to Abuto`s chagrin. Sarasvati performs a sneak attack at Rumiko. Abuto forces Kanae to attack T.L.System at their photo shooting but Yukimura shows her full power this time.
